hero.title: The Operating System for the Agentic Enterprise
hero.subtitle: Move beyond chatbots. Build, deploy, and govern autonomous AI agents that reason, collaborate, and execute at scale.

thesis.title: The Cognitive Turn: From Generative to Agentic
thesis.content: We are navigating a pivotal inflection point from stateless reasoning engines to autonomous workers with agency. The era of fragmented 'GPT wrappers' is over. Kendra Labs provides the unified layer for production-grade autonomy, solving the 'Box of Parts' problem by abstracting the agentic stack into a modular, composable architecture.
